title: Accidental Riot Points Purchase
body:
Hey guys, I accidentally bought a 35 CAD RP pack this morning. Though I have sent a ticket regarding whether I can get a refund, just wanted to know if any of you had ever came across this problem and how did you got responded? 
Thanks and good night

replies.body: As long as that RP wasn't spent and it was just purchased today, our billing agents should be able to help once they grab your ticket!
Thank you so much for replying. Glad to hear that <3
